roleset.name: combine, mix again
roleset.note: RECOMBINE-V NOTES: Frame created by Jena (from recombine.01-v)
RECOMBINATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts. Added arg4-domain here.

example.name: recombine-v
example.text: Information cells can recombine themselves without limit.

example.name: recombination-n
example.text: This physical separation of different chromosomes is important for the ability of DNA to function as a stable repository for information , as one of the few times chromosomes interact is in chromosomal crossover which occurs during sexual reproduction , when genetic recombination occurs .
